headline: The 5 Most Interesting Analyst Questions From PulteGroup’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: PulteGroup’s fourth quarter saw a positive market reaction as the company delivered revenue above Wall Street’s expectations, despite notable declines in both sales and profit margins. Management attributed the quarter’s performance to continued strength in its geographically diverse operations—especially in the Midwest, Northeast, and Florida—where demand has held up better than in Texas and Western markets. CEO Ryan Marshall emphasized the benefits of the company’s diversified buyer base, noti
